name: EEG-fMRI Machine Learning
tagline: Machine Learning model of predicting fMRI activation through EEG data.
body:
### Why.
The goal is to use EEG signals to predict fMRI activation in a specific ROI.

### How.
Paradigm: IAPS - Presentation of pictures with either negative or neutral valence.
Data: 4 runs, each with approximately 145 TRs.

### Data Preprocessing.
BrainImagingPipelines Preprocessing Workflow: Motion Correction, Realignment, Smoothing (Kernel = 6 fWHM), etc.

### Preparation of EEG data.
 
```
$ cd your_repo_root/repo_name
$ git fetch origin
$ git checkout gh-pages
```
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
